name: The Beast
description:
"The Beast" is the sixth artwork of the "Inflatables" series.

The series was inspired by Jeff Koons “Balloons” collection.
As a generative artist, I asked myself how to bend, stretch, squeeze and inflate multiple balloon like objects randomly at once, to create an interesting new structure.
The result is a series of unique artworks, entirely created and written in the programming language R (code).

png.file (6000x6000)
